title: rustc 1.64.0 crashes on armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: O-Arm
labels.description: Target: 32-bit Arm processors (armv6, armv7, thumb...), including 64-bit Arm in AArch32 state

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code The Bug is not reproducible. I started removing code portions and it went away. When i returned to the original codebase the error did not show up anymore. ```Rust ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.64.0 (a55dd71d5 2022-09-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: a55dd71d5fb0ec5a6a3a9e8c27b2127ba491ce52 commit-date: 2022-09-19 host: armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf release: 1.64.0 LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: no warnings or errors encountered even though `delayed_good_path_bugs` issued error: internal compiler error: trimmed_def_paths constructed | = note: delayed at 0: std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace at /rustc/a55dd71d5fb0ec5a6a3a9e8c27b2127ba491ce52/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized at /rustc/a55dd71d5fb0ec5a6a3a9e8c27b2127ba491ce52/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: std::backtrace::Backtrace::create at /rustc/a55dd71d5fb0ec5a6a3a9e8c27b2127ba491ce52/library/std/src/backtrace.rs:328:13 3: std::backtrace::Backtrace::force_capture at rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>>> 8: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query:: 9: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::trimmed_def_paths::force_from_dep_node 10: ::try_force_from_dep_node 11: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 12: ::try_mark_green 13: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::determine_cgu_reuse 14: as alloc::vec::spec_from_iter::SpecFromIter, rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate::{closure#4}::{closure#0}>>>::from_iter 15: ::time::, rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate::{closure#4}> 16: ::codegen_crate 17: ::time::,
